name: DarkFi
intro: Base layer for anonymous applications and smart contracts
introduce: DarkFi is a new Layer 1 blockchain, designed with anonymity at the forefront. It offers flexible private primitives that can be wielded to create any kind of application. DarkFi aims to make anonymous engineering highly accessible to developers. DarkFi uses advances in zero-knowledge cryptography and includes a contracting language and developer toolkits to create uncensorable code. Go dark by depositing assets from Ethereum, Bitcoin or Monero into DarkFi to mint anonymous darkened assets and transact privately.
